meta.source_provenance: Email from noreply-public@digital-policing.co.uk to Ben Carter on 2024-11-13 (issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon, Sussex Police)

emails.subject_summary: Jonathan Dixon requires your assistance in a police investigation
emails.body_raw:
You have been requested by Jonathan Dixon, a Police Officer or member of Police Staff, to provide data to assist with a police investigation/enquiry.
Please click here to respond to this request. The link will expire on 27/11/2024.
emails.body: Evidence-portal request sent to Ben Carter via Digital Policing, issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon, Sussex Police.

sentence_tags.text: The link to the request will expire on 27/11/2024.
sentence_tags.notes: Sets a renewed, later deadline for evidence submission (27 November 2024).

contradiction_links.claim: Police provided clear, reliable access to evidence submission.
contradiction_links.reality: Repeated time-limited portal links from the same officer risk confusion; the later expiry (27/11/2024) suggests prior intake may have lapsed or been duplicated.

events: Digital Policing portal request re-issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon (case 47240214305).

damages_summary.emotional: Confusion/stress from repeated requests with changing deadlines.
damages_summary.strategic: Risk of evidence gaps if earlier links expired and later link not actioned promptly.
damages_summary.reputational: Potential misframing as non-cooperation if deadlines are missed.
